Review:
The "Gyan Agni" is the name of the technical and cultural fest of our college which is a 3-day event which is not been held since 2019, after Covid. The college has a library which has a lot of books but that is not sufficient for every student. All the basic amenities are available in the classroom including a smart board.
The college has a ground for cricket as well as football and other indoor games are also available. Tournaments like GPL for cricket and football are held annually.
The name for the coding club is Communicode which is run to develop to coding culture in college.

Name: Anuj patel

Firstly I have always been fascinated by how electrical and electronics systems work, and I wanted to learn more about them, Additionally, I believe that electrical and electronics engineering has a wide range of practical applications from designing and developing new technology to improving existing systems.

Name: Amisha Gogia
College: Woxsen School of Arts and Design
Heading: Great infrastructure and amenities
Review:
The course is absolutely good. The college has almost everything for its infrastructure that a design student needs. I chose fashion because I like making dresses with new designs. It is a 4-year course with 8 semesters each of 4-5 months, the semester is conducted module-wise. One module goes on from 7-20 days depending on the load of the subject. One faculty handles 40-50 students max. The faculties are mostly NIFT and NID graduates. We also get international faculties.
The design exams are mostly working all semester and showcasing and explaining it to the external jury.
